cause.description:
Promo X® Ministries Salvation starts with the letter X ™
Why does salvation start with the letter X? Here the letter X is the greek letter chi representing Christ.
So, salvation starts with Christ. With Christ, one can have salvation.
LOGO FACTS - The "X" in the logo is the greek letter chi for Christ. The metal ring around the "X" is a contemporized take on the crown of thorns.
"PROMOTE CHRIST", the "X" logo and "PROMO X" are registered trademarks of the PROMO X GROUP. All rights reserved.
For more information, visit http://www.PromoteChrist.com
1. Reaching the unchurched through creative and relevant ways.
2. Promoting Christ to those who don't know of Him; or have not accepted Him as their personal savior.
3. Expanding His Kingdom.
cause.mission: Sharing the gospel with others in hopes of one day leading someone to Christ...hence PROMOTE CHRIST®.
